amendment.description: At the end of title I, insert the following: SEC. 1XX. JUDICIAL REVIEW FOR PROPOSED ALTERNATIVE ENVIRONMENTAL REVIEW AND APPROVAL PROCEDURES. Section 330(e) of title 23, United States Code, is amended-- ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to harmonize the statute of limitations for Section 1309 of P.L. 114-94 with other Department of Transportation projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Denham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
